about_the_game:
Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

A special training pack for your avatar!

As you train with Obito Uchiha (Ten Tails), you will acquire Training Points which can be used to unlock a wide variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

Content includes:
• 2 Ninjutsu
- Truthseeking Scorch (Ranged Type)
- Cross Lantern (Ranged Type)

• 1 Secret Technique
- Sage of Six Paths' Divine Blade: The Nunoboko (Ranged Type)

• 1 Costume
- Obito Outfit Ten Tails Ver.

• 1 Avatar Part
- Accessory: Ten Tails Horn

• 1 Weapon
- Ninja Tools: Warped Truthseeker Orb

• Additional Content
- 2 Shinobi Boost Seals
- Honorary Title: Peacebringer
detailed_description:
Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

A special training pack for your avatar!

As you train with Obito Uchiha (Ten Tails), you will acquire Training Points which can be used to unlock a wide variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

Content includes:
• 2 Ninjutsu
- Truthseeking Scorch (Ranged Type)
- Cross Lantern (Ranged Type)

• 1 Secret Technique
- Sage of Six Paths' Divine Blade: The Nunoboko (Ranged Type)

• 1 Costume
- Obito Outfit Ten Tails Ver.

• 1 Avatar Part
- Accessory: Ten Tails Horn

• 1 Weapon
- Ninja Tools: Warped Truthseeker Orb

• Additional Content
- 2 Shinobi Boost Seals

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
